Today in Donegal, it's looking great with 5 ft @10s WNW swell and light 5 mph N winds. Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand are your top picks, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 3 ft @8s with light S winds, still providing fun waves at spots like Magheroaty Beach and Dooey Beach. On the day after, conditions remain decent with 4 ft @8s W swell, but winds pick up to 11 mph S, making it a bit choppy. Best: today.
